name: Junkyard Attack
description:
Junkyard Attack is game where a platforming player tries to escape by reaching the top while the Tetris player tries to squish or block the player into toxic water.

The Platforming Player is able to Run, Jump and Pick up blocks!

All of this to avoid death  from toxic water or getting squished by blocks and escape!

The Tetris Player is able to Drop blocks faster, Move blocks and Rotate blocks!

Use those tools to stop the Platforming Player from reaching the top!

I recommend using two controllers while playing this game.

Controls can be seen in game.

Thank you for reading <3

Melz.
